metadata.title: CVE-2019-3992 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: ELOG 3.1.4-57bea22 and below is affected by an information disclosure vulnerability. A remote unauthenticated attacker can access the server's configuration file by sending an HTTP GET request. Amongst the configuration data, the attacker may gain access to valid admin usernames and, in older versions of ELOG, passwords.

criterions.comment: elog package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
